GSD.description:
dm ioctl: fix misbehavior if list_versions races with module loading

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.156 by commit f59f5a269ca5e43c567aca7f1f52500a0186e9b7. For more details please see the references link.
